targets.rawSql: SELECT "timestamp", temperature FROM station_data inner join scd41_data on station_data.scd41_data_id=scd41_data.id WHERE station_id = $station_id AND border_router_id = $border_router_id ORDER BY "timestamp"

SELECT "timestamp", temperature FROM station_data inner join svm41_data on station_data.svm41_data_id=svm41_data.id WHERE station_id = $station_id AND border_router_id = $border_router_id ORDER BY "timestamp"

SELECT "timestamp", co2 FROM station_data inner join scd41_data on station_data.scd41_data_id=scd41_data.id WHERE station_id = $station_id AND border_router_id = $border_router_id ORDER BY "timestamp"

SELECT "timestamp", humidity FROM station_data inner join scd41_data on station_data.scd41_data_id=scd41_data.id WHERE station_id = $station_id AND border_router_id = $border_router_id ORDER BY "timestamp"

SELECT "timestamp", humidity FROM station_data inner join svm41_data on station_data.svm41_data_id=svm41_data.id WHERE station_id = $station_id AND border_router_id = $border_router_id ORDER BY "timestamp"

SELECT "timestamp", nox_index FROM station_data inner join svm41_data on station_data.svm41_data_id=svm41_data.id WHERE station_id = $station_id AND border_router_id = $border_router_id ORDER BY "timestamp"

SELECT "timestamp", voc_index FROM station_data inner join svm41_data on station_data.svm41_data_id=svm41_data.id WHERE station_id = $station_id AND border_router_id = $border_router_id ORDER BY "timestamp"

SELECT "timestamp", eco2 FROM station_data inner join ens160_data on station_data.ens160_data_id=ens160_data.id WHERE station_id = $station_id AND border_router_id = $border_router_id ORDER BY "timestamp"

SELECT "timestamp", tvoc FROM station_data inner join ens160_data on station_data.ens160_data_id=ens160_data.id WHERE station_id = $station_id AND border_router_id = $border_router_id ORDER BY "timestamp"

SELECT "timestamp", aqi FROM station_data inner join ens160_data on station_data.ens160_data_id=ens160_data.id WHERE station_id = $station_id AND border_router_id = $border_router_id ORDER BY "timestamp"

list.description: The id from the border router that forwarded the data
list.label: Border Router Id
list.name: border_router_id

list.description: The sensor station that gathered the data
list.label: Sensor Station id
list.name: station_id
